meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Public</kanji> <kanji>damage</kanji> is something that affects everyone, the whole public. What is in the air and gets into everything no matter where you are? How about <vocabulary>pollution</vocabulary>?
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
